00027 #ifndef _K_VECTOR_H_
00028 #define _K_VECTOR_H_
00029 
00030 // Include STL less comparison template (used by default).
00031 #include <functional>
00032 
00041 template <typename T, typename Compare = std::less<T> >
00042 class k_vector {
00043 public:
00045   k_vector(unsigned int K, const Compare &c = Compare());
00046 
00048   ~k_vector();
00049 
00050   // K-vector properties.
00051   bool empty() const; 
00052   bool full() const; 
00053   unsigned int size() const; 
00054 
00055   const T &front() const; 
00056   const T &back() const; 
00057 
00058   // Operations.
00059   void pop_back(); 
00060   void push_back(const T &elem); 
00061 
00062 protected:
00063   T *data; 
00064   unsigned int K; 
00065   unsigned int stored; 
00066   const Compare &compare; 
00067 
00068   void push_not_full(const T &elem); 
00069   void push_full(const T &elem); 
00070 };
00071 
00072 // Template implementation.
00073 #include "k-vector.cpp"
00074 
00075 #endif
